items.question: What companies do you own?
items.answer: Tesla Motors, SpaceX, PayPal, Zip2 Corporation, SolarCity, The Boring Company, Hyperloop, OpenAI, and Neuralink

items.answer: I have a degree in Physics and business in University of Pennsylvania

items.answer: No, but I might be a trillionaire…

items.answer: I drive Tesla Model S the most

items.answer: There’re Model S, Model 3, Model X, and Model Y. SEXY!

items.answer: It will be the first electirc pickup truck on the market

items.question: Are all Tesla’s automatic?
items.answer: No, Teslas are intended for use with a fully attentive driver. The currently enabled features do not make the vehicle autonomous

items.question: What is the purpose of SpaceX?
items.answer: SpaceX designs, manufactures and launches the world's most advanced rockets and spacecraft

items.question: Is The Boring Company real?
items.answer: Yes, it’s a infrastructure and tunnel construction services company

items.question: What is the purpose of Neuralink?
items.answer: The goal would be to enable people with paralysis to directly use their neural activity to operate computers and mobile devices with speed and ease

items.question: Will Neuralink make you smarter?
items.answer: By dramatically reducing the time it takes to gather information, maybe.

items.question: Can anyone get Neuralink?
items.answer: The first humans to receive the chips would be people with severe spinal-cord injuries

items.question: Can Neuralink be used for gaming?
Can I buy SpaceX stock?
items.answer: Maybe. SpaceX is not a public company, it is privately owned

items.question: Do you pay tax?
items.answer: For those wondering, I will pay over $11 billion in taxes for 2021

items.question: Do you invest in cryptocurrency?
items.answer: I literally own zero cryptocurrency, apart from .25 BTC that a friend sent me many years ago
